item.title: Milligram
item.description: HugoModo Milligram Based on Milligram by CJ Patoilo.

item.title: Best Motherfucking Website
item.description: HugoModo Best Motherfucking Website Based on The Best Motherfucking Website, this theme provides minimal style definitions to create a clean, highly readable theme to be used as the base for customisation or for websites with a minimalist feel. Installation git submodule add https://github.com/hugomodo/hugomodo themes/hugomodo git submodule add https://github.com/hugomodo/hugomodo-best-motherfucking-website themes/hugomodo-best-motherfucking-websitethemes = ["hugomodo-best-motherfucking-website"] Support on Beerpay Hey dude! Help me out for a couple of üçª!
